section.title: Tracking of changes in response to the 3rd Public Review
section.para: This section tracks all changes made to this specification compared to the Committee Specification Draft 03 / Public Review Draft 03 https://docs.oasis-open.org/lexidma/dmlex/v1.0/csd03/dmlex-v1.0-csd03.pdf. The 3rd public review took place from 28th June 2024 until 27th July 2024.

listitem.para: Editorial error corrections were made in response to OASIS Admin csd03 comments (Github issue 134.
